name: Deep Salvage
description:
This is a game about scuba diving for salvage. Manage your air and bottom time to safely bring back the salvage and get money. Spend money on upgrades to let you go deeper and deeper.

Instructions:

- Rotate the player with "WSAD"

- Swim forward by pressing "Space"

- Interact with objects using "E"

- Move the camera with the mouse

Goal:

Collect and deposit salvage to gain more money

Buy upgrades with money for various things

Go Deeper with your new upgrades!
